DialogueOption.Text: Hey Tephra, did you hear anything about ghost matter disappearing?
I found where the weird rock goes when it hides, Tephra!
Where are the Nomai Ruins again?

Dialogue.Page: Wait, ghost matter disappears sometimes? Really? I didn't know!
That's awesome! I'm gonna go jump into a patch of ghost matter right now!

DialogueOption.Text: No no no, I was asking who might've told you that!
Don't ever do that! You'll just get badly hurt!

Dialogue.Page: Oh..
Aw... I thought since it's disappearing too, I might finally be able to find out where the weird rock in the museum goes.

DialogueOption.Text: The weird rock in the museum?

Dialogue.Page: Yeah, the weird purple rock in the exhibit right outside the museum that jumps around! It's so good at hiding!
Oh, but I don't mean when it jumps behind you and scares you.. I mean when it disappears completely!
Galena and I both looked all over Timber Hearth to find where it goes when it disappears. But we could never find the purple rock's <color=orange>super secret hiding spot.</color>
The only place we couldn't explore was the Nomai Ruins on Timber Hearth, outside the village.
We wanted to look there too.. But Mayor Rutile told us not to ever go near there, because there's lots of dangerous ghost matter around that area that we can't see.
I thought if the ghost matter disappeared, maybe we could look there at last..
Um, could you help us check out the Nomai Ruins on Timber Hearth, astronaut? The purple rock might be hiding there somewhere!
You're taller than us, so you if you accidentally walk into some ghost matter, you'll just lose your legs!

DialogueOption.Text: Huh... I'll keep an eye out for it!
Wait, where are the Nomai Ruins again?

Dialogue.Page: Um.. It's somewhere on Timber Hearth, outside the village!
Oh! I think there's a picture of the <color=orange>Nomai Ruins..</color> framed in the museum, astronaut. If you look at that, that should tell you what it looks like!
Woah, really?! Where does it go?

DialogueOption.Text: It travels to a dark cave somewhere on Timber Hearth.
It travels to a sanctuary made to protect Hearthians from a supernova.

Dialogue.Page: Wow, you found it already?! You're awesome, astronaut!
But.. How do you get in the spooky cave it's hiding in? Galena and I want to get in so we can use it for playing hide and seek..
Yay! You're the best, astronaut!
Come back and tell us if you find where the purple rock goes, alright?
Um.. It's somewhere on Timber Hearth, outside the village!
Oh! I think there's a picture of the <color=orange>Nomai Ruins..</color> framed in the museum, astronaut. If you look at that, that should tell you what it looks like!
Good luck out there, astronaut!
Come back and tell us if you find where the purple rock goes, alright?
Woah, really? The supernova is something the sun does, right? The exhibit in the museum taught me that!
Why would the Nomai build something like that? Is it just an emergency hiding spot in case that happens someday?
But if it is, why would they seal it up and hide it like that? There's no way to get in or out of there, heehee!
The Nomai are weeeird!

DialogueOption.Text: Hey Tephra, did you hear anything about ghost matter disappearing?
I found where the weird rock goes when it hides, Tephra!
Where are the Nomai Ruins again?
Hey Tephra, did you hear anything about ghost matter disappearing?
I found where the weird rock goes when it hides, Tephra!
Where are the Nomai Ruins again?
